izzy.features.power¶

izzy.features.power(x, exponent)[source]¶

Raises to an arbitrary exponent

Parameters

  • x (int, float, or ArrayLike) – Value(s)

  • exponent (int or float) – Exponent

Returns

Value(s) raised to exponent

Return type

int, float, or ArrayLike
